content.question: The cartoon was primarily a response to the

choices.label: increasing popularity of isolationism among United States policy makers
ongoing controversy over the appropriate use of executive branch authority in conducting foreign policy
expanding opposition to the Korean War
growing debate over the Vietnam War

content.answer: growing debate over the Vietnam War

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
